message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $120 for it.

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.

I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a decent profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $130 and $140, so I'll offer it to you for $135. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $132 for the product.
I'm getting close to your price, Bob, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $132 and $135, so I'll offer it to you for $133. Let's see if we can finalize the deal.
